description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref: P2015/0824/S73 in order to alter the 15th floor fenestration on the southern elevation.
decision_conditions:
Condition 1 of application reference P2015/0824/S73 shall now read:

CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved drawings and information:

207 - 211 Old Street Planning Statement, Townscape Heritage & Visual Assessment, Appendix B: Planning Submission Drawings, Transport Assessment, Daylight & Sunlight Assessment, Draft Construction Management Plan, Statement of Community Involvement, Design and Access Statement, Flood Risk Assessment, Energy and Sustainability Statement, Environmental Report, Clarification of Treatment of Baldwin Street Corner of New Office Building, 12016_00_A_(01)_P010,
